meanings.definition: The practice or custom of having more than one spouse at the same time.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, polygamy is accepted and even encouraged.
meanings.sent2: Polygamy was common in ancient societies.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show joked about a character trying to juggle polygamy with multiple partners.
meanings.sent4: To some, managing work, family, and friends simultaneously feels like practicing polygamy.
meanings.sent5: The concept of polygamy can be complex but fascinating to study.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of having multiple spouses.
meanings.sent1: Polygamy can lead to complicated family dynamics.
meanings.sent2: The legal system may have specific regulations regarding polygamy.
meanings.sent3: The soap opera storyline involved a scandalous case of polygamy.
meanings.sent4: In a figurative sense, managing multiple projects at once can feel like dealing with polygamy.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the challenges and joys of polygamy in a thought-provoking manner.
